name: congolese
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging to or relating to the Democratic Republic of the Congo or the Republic of the Congo, or their people: Papa Wemba was a well-known Congolese musician. His mother is Italian and his father is Congolese. the Congolese government
More examplesFewer examplesCongolese medical authorities are tracking the disease and alerting the public.French as spoken in France is quite different from Congolese French.

[ C ] plural Congolese a person from the Democratic Republic of the Congo or the Republic of the Congo: Many of the Congolese speak French. After independence, Congolese had high hopes for reforms.
[ U ] any of the Bantu languages spoken in the Congo region, especially the Kongo or Kikongo language: Some of the songs are sung in English; others are in Arabic or Congolese.
